articles.description: Powell affirmed his commitment to keeping interest rates low for the foreseeable future even as he expressed hope for a strong economic recovery.
articles.content:
Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell affirmed his commitment to keeping interest rates low for the foreseeable future even as he expressed hope for a strong economic recovery.

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Christopher & Banks is going out of business - CNN
articles.description: Christopher & Banks is joining the long list of retailers filing for bankruptcy and disappearing from America's malls.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Delta turned record profit into a record loss in one year - CNN
articles.description: Delta Air Lines closed the books on the worst year in its history.
